CVE-2018-17199.summary: In Apache HTTP Server 2.4 release 2.4.37 and prior, mod_session checks the session expiry time before decoding the session. This causes session expiry time to be ignored for mod_session_cookie sessions since the expiry time is loaded when the session is decoded.

CVE-2018-17189.summary: In Apache HTTP server versions 2.4.37 and prior, by sending request bodies in a slow loris way to plain resources, the h2 stream for that request unnecessarily occupied a server thread cleaning up that incoming data. This affects only HTTP/2 (mod_http2) connections.

CVE-2019-0190.summary: A bug exists in the way mod_ssl handled client renegotiations. A remote attacker could send a carefully crafted request that would cause mod_ssl to enter a loop leading to a denial of service. This bug can be only triggered with Apache HTTP Server version 2.4.37 when using OpenSSL version 1.1.1 or later, due to an interaction in changes to handling of renegotiation attempts.

You are here: Home

A fair and prosperous city region

The Fair Employment Charter is an important element of Steve Rotheram’s efforts to improve the pay and conditions for thousands of working people across the Liverpool City Region.

Find out more

A fair and prosperous city region

The Fair Employment Charter is an important element of Steve Rotheram’s efforts to improve the pay and conditions for thousands of working people across the Liverpool City Region.

Find out more

Who we are

Learn about what it means to have a Combined Authority and what we strive for.

Learn more

Skills and Apprenticeships

We are working to ensure people of all ages get the skills they need, and for as many people as possible in the city region to have the opportunity to work and to be fairly rewarded for doing so. We are working to deliver tailored support for jobseekers, close the skills gap for our region’s businesses and tackle the barriers that prevent people getting into employment.

Skills & Apprenticeships

Devolution

Devolution means having the power to make the big decisions that affect local people, right here in the Liverpool City Region, and we are using those powers to improve people’s lives, through the work of the Combined Authority.

Devolution

Transport

We’re improving and transforming the ways in which people can move around our city region and beyond. We want to create a fully integrated, modern and inclusive transport network that benefits everyone, connecting people to employment, education, leisure and new opportunities.

Transport

Your
Metro Mayor

Steve Rotheram was elected in 2017 as the first Metro Mayor of the Liverpool City Region and leads the Liverpool City Region Combined Authority in its work to benefit the people and communities in every part of our city region.

Discover more
